dashboard.label: Drone Status Studio
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_single_1":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"drilldown":"none","refresh.display":"progressbar"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1"},"title":"Drone Name"},"viz_single_2":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"colorMode":"block","drilldown":"none","refresh.display":"progressbar","backgroundColor":"> majorValue | rangeValue(convertedColorRange)"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_2"},"title":"Drone Status","context":{"convertedColorRange":[{"from":0,"value":"#dc4e41"},{"to":0,"value":"#53a051"}]}},"viz_single_3":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"colorMode":"block","drilldown":"none","numberPrecision":1,"refresh.display":"progressbar","sparklineDisplay":"below","trendDisplay":"absolute","trellis.enabled":0,"trellis.scales.shared":1,"trellis.size":"medium","trendInterval":"-5m","unit":"c","unitPosition":"after","shouldUseThousandSeparators":true,"backgroundColor":"> majorValue | rangeValue(convertedColorRange)"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_3"},"title":"Battery Temperature","context":{"convertedColorRange":[{"from":35,"value":"#dc4e41"},{"from":32,"to":35,"value":"#f1813f"},{"from":30,"to":32,"value":"#f8be34"},{"from":28,"to":30,"value":"#0877a6"},{"to":28,"value":"#53a051"}]}},"viz_single_4":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"colorMode":"block","drilldown":"none","numberPrecision":0,"sparklineDisplay":"below","trendDisplay":"absolute","trellis.enabled":0,"trellis.scales.shared":1,"trellis.size":"medium","unit":"%","unitPosition":"after","shouldUseThousandSeparators":true,"backgroundColor":"> majorValue | rangeValue(convertedColorRange)"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_4"},"title":"Drone Battery Charge Level","context":{"convertedColorRange":[{"from":90,"value":"#53a051"},{"from":70,"to":90,"value":"#006d9c"},{"from":30,"to":70,"value":"#f8be34"},{"from":12,"to":30,"value":"#f1813f"},{"to":12,"value":"#dc4e41"}]}},"viz_single_5":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"colorMode":"block","drilldown":"none","refresh.display":"progressbar","underLabel":"seconds","backgroundColor":"> majorValue | rangeValue(convertedColorRange)"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_5"},"title":"Flight Time","context":{"convertedColorRange":[{"from":500,"value":"#dc4e41"},{"to":500,"value":"#53a051"}]}},"viz_single_6":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"colorMode":"block","drilldown":"none","numberPrecision":0,"refresh.display":"progressbar","sparklineDisplay":"below","trendDisplay":"absolute","trellis.enabled":0,"trellis.scales.shared":1,"trellis.size":"medium","unit":"Flights","unitPosition":"after","shouldUseThousandSeparators":true,"backgroundColor":"> majorValue | rangeValue(convertedColorRange)"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_6"},"title":"# of Flights","context":{"convertedColorRange":[{"from":5,"value":"#dc4e41"},{"from":3,"to":5,"value":"#f1813f"},{"from":1,"to":3,"value":"#f8be34"},{"from":0,"to":1,"value":"#0877a6"},{"to":0,"value":"#53a051"}]}},"viz_error_1":{"type":"viz.error","options":{},"dataSources":{},"eventHandlers":[]},"viz_chart_1":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"axisLabelsX.majorLabelStyle.overflowMode":"ellipsisNone","axisLabelsX.majorLabelStyle.rotation":0,"axisTitleX.visibility":"visible","axisTitleY.visibility":"visible","axisTitleY2.visibility":"visible","axisX.abbreviation":"none","axisX.scale":"linear","axisY.abbreviation":"none","axisY.scale":"linear","axisY2.abbreviation":"none","axisY2.enabled":1,"axisY2.scale":"inherit","chart.bubbleMaximumSize":50,"chart.bubbleMinimumSize":10,"chart.bubbleSizeBy":"area","chart.nullValueMode":"gaps","chart.overlayFields":"batteryTemperature","chart.showDataLabels":"minmax","chart.sliceCollapsingThreshold":0.01,"chart.stackMode":"default","chart.style":"shiny","drilldown":"none","layout.splitSeries":0,"layout.splitSeries.allowIndependentYRanges":0,"legend.labelStyle.overflowMode":"ellipsisMiddle","legend.mode":"standard","legend.placement":"right","lineWidth":2,"trellis.enabled":0,"trellis.scales.shared":1,"trellis.size":"medium"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_7"}},"viz_error_2":{"type":"viz.error","options":{},"dataSources":{},"eventHandlers":[]}},"dataSources":{"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=mavericktest 
| replace "0BMUE7J0011707" with "Rocinante" IN aircraftSerialNumber
| chart latest(aircraftSerialNumber) as "Drone Name"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}}},"ds_search_2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index="mavericktest" (flightMode!="P-GPS" AND flightMode!=OPTI) isFlying=* 
| replace "TakeOff" with "In Flight" IN flightMode
| replace "P-Atti" with "Ready for Take Off" in flightMode
| chart latest(flightMode) as "Current Drone Mode"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}}},"ds_search_3":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=mavericktest
| timechart latest(batteryTemperature)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}}},"ds_search_4":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=mavericktest
| chart latest(batteryCharge)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}}},"ds_search_5":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=mavericktest 
| chart latest(flightTime)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}}},"ds_search_6":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=mavericktest
| chart latest(flightCount)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}}},"ds_search_7":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=mavericktest
| timechart span=1minute min(batteryCharge) as "Battery Level"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}}}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{}}}}},"inputs":{"input_1":{"type":"input.timerange","title":"Time Picker","options":{"token":"field1","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"}}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"submitButton":false,"display":"auto-scale","height":1000},"structure":[{"item":"viz_single_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":1200,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_single_2","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":250,"w":240,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_single_3","type":"block","position":{"x":240,"y":250,"w":240,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_single_4","type":"block","position":{"x":480,"y":250,"w":240,"h":115}},{"item":"viz_single_5","type":"block","position":{"x":720,"y":250,"w":240,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_single_6","type":"block","position":{"x":960,"y":250,"w":240,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_error_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":500,"w":600,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":500,"w":600,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_error_2","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":750,"w":1200,"h":250}}],"globalInputs":["input_1"]},"description":"","title":"Drone Status Studio"}
